result.reason: Feature request to expose RDP device redirection settings (local drives, printers, ports, smart cards) in connection properties UI via MsRdpClient AdvancedSettings.
result.approach: Add device redirection properties (RedirectDrives, RedirectPrinters, RedirectPorts, RedirectSmartCards, RedirectClipboard) to ConnectionInfo and wire them to MsRdpClientAdvancedSettings in the RDP protocol handler, then expose checkboxes in the connection properties UI panel.
